articles.title: Sci-fi lovers descend on Swindon for Comic Con - BBC
articles.description: Stars of the big and small screen appear at Swindon's Comic Con extravaganza.
articles.content:
Stars of science fiction and television are in Swindon for the town's Comic Convention.
